articles.author: Ben Finley
articles.title: Pat Robertson, broadcaster who helped make religion central to GOP politics, dies at 93 - The Associated Press
articles.description: VIRGINIA BEACH, Va. (AP) — Pat Robertson , a religious broadcaster who turned a tiny Virginia station into the global Christian Broadcasting Network, tried a run for president and helped make religion central to Republican Party politics in America through hi…
